short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor recent your github activity in 'Piyo'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension introducing a GitHub activity monitoring application.

This application retrieves GitHub information for the input user and renders a character whose movements vary based on the recent number of commits. The character's motion is proportional to the commit count, allowing users to visually gauge their GitHub activity level based on the intensity of the character's movements.

The target users of this application are GitHub users. By using this app, users can visually comprehend their efforts, leading to potential improvements in their development drive and motivation.
